notionDatabaseID.title: Notion Database ID
notionDatabaseID.description: Enter the ID of the Notion database you wish to convert to HTML. This ID can be found in the database URL.

notionToken.title: Notion App Token
notionToken.description: Enter your Notion integration token. This token is required for authentication and can be generated in your Notion settings under 'Integrations'.

notionFilterValue.title: Status value to filter articles by
notionFilterValue.description: Specify the status value to filter database entries. Only entries matching this status will be processed.

notionUpdatedValue.title: New Status Value (after the automation is completed)
notionUpdatedValue.description: Define the new status value for entries after processing. This value will be applied to the 'Status' property of each processed entry.

ghostURL.title: Ghost API URL
ghostURL.description: Provide the URL to your Ghost blog's Content API. This URL is used to connect and transmit data to your Ghost blog.

ghostKey.title: Ghost Content API Key
ghostKey.description: Enter your Ghost Content API Key. This key allows the actor to authenticate and interact with your Ghost blog's Content API.
